message: Let's start fair, I'll take 99% and you get 1%.
I think 99/1 is a bit too lopsided. Let's try a 90/10 split this time.
I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, but I still need the majority share.  Let's do a 95/5 split.
I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I need at least 90% to make it worthwhile after the inflation. Let's do a 90/10 split.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'll accept a 90/10 split, but I'm not going lower than that.
